title: IICT Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 09 Junior Stenographer and Other Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Chemical Technology (IICT) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of Junior Stenographer and Multi-Tasking Staff Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, 12th can apply for the IICT Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selec...
